name: repair-feedback
title: Repair Feedback
introduction_text: Provide your feedback for the repair order.
custom_js: frappe.web_form.after_save = () => { const name = frappe.web_form.get_value('name'); const score = frappe.web_form.get_value('feedback_score'); const notes = frappe.web_form.get_value('feedback_notes'); if (name) { frappe.call('frappe.client.set_value', { doctype: 'Repair Order', name: name, fieldname: { feedback_score: score, feedback_notes: notes } }).then(() => { frappe.msgprint(__('Thank you for your feedback.')); }); } };
